content.en: Secure Color Encryption: A set of scientific abstracts analyzed the security and performance of various algorithms for color image encryption. The algorithms were found to have strong abilities against attacks, high security, sensitivity, and speed, good encryption results, low time complexity, and resistance against common attacks. They also enhanced the security of transmitting color images, had good robustness against attacks, and provided high protection against various attacks. Overall, these algorithms offer effective and secure methods for encrypting color images.
content.da: Sikker Farvekryptering: En række videnskabelige abstracts analyserede sikkerheden og ydeevnen af forskellige algoritmer til farvebilledkryptering. Algoritmerne viste sig at have stærke evner mod angreb, høj sikkerhed, følsomhed og hastighed, gode krypteringsresultater, lav tidskompleksitet og modstandsdygtighed mod almindelige angreb. De forbedrede også sikkerheden ved transmission af farvebilleder, havde god robusthed mod angreb og gav høj beskyttelse mod forskellige angreb. Samlet set tilbyder disse algoritmer effektive og sikre metoder til kryptering af farvebilleder.
